We're more than just a car:
More than a car washâ€”a team of passion, precision, and professionalism.
Unparalleled quality, customer-focused service, a sustainable approach, and trusted expertise.
We ensure your car always shines, just as it deserves.
Our inspiration comes from the pride peo:
Our inspiration stems from the pride car enthusiasts feel when their vehicle shines like new. Every vehicle tells a unique story, and by maintaining it perfectly clean, fresh, and meticulously, we maintain its condition at the highest level.

Driving Pleasure | Customer Satisfaction | Innovation in Car Care | Passion for Perfection
This passion drives us to deliver more than just a clean carâ€”we create an experience.
ECD was founded with a simple missionâ€”: My passion for car care began when I was twelve, working weekends at the local car wash. There, I watched people carefully wash their cars, often failing to achieve the desired results. One day, I approached my very first customer; he always washed his own car in the car wash. I suggested I treat his car for him, so he could relax while I did it. Week after week, I saw how satisfying this was for both him and me. Then I thought, "Why not just bring this service to people's homes?" So I suggested I come to his home to treat his car. That's how my hobby gradually grew into what is now Exclusive Car Detailing.
From day one, we set out to make car was: From day one, we set out to make car washing and detailing easier, greener, and more effective. By combining premium products, skilled experts, and mobile convenience, weâ€™ve built a service that fits seamlessly into your lifestyle.
Today, our story continues with:
More than five years later, we treat an average of 130-150 cars per month. What
sets us apart? Top quality, personalized service, and honoring our agreements.
Through word-of-mouth, our clientele continues to grow, and our goal remains clear: to provide all of South Holland with luxury, on-site car care.

privacy_intro: At Exclusive Car Detailing, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services.
privacy_info_collect: We collect several types of information to provide and improve our services:
Vehicle information (license plate, numb: Vehicle information (license plate, number of cars)
To provide and deliver car detailing ser: To provide and deliver car detailing services
To communicate with you about your booki: To communicate with you about your booking
To improve our website and services: To improve our website and services
To send you marketing communications (wi: To send you marketing communications (with your consent)
To analyze website usage and performance: To analyze website usage and performance
privacy_cookies_intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience. You have full control over your cookie preferences via our cookie settings.
privacy_necessary_cookies: These cookies are essential for the website to function. They cannot be disabled and include session management, language preferences, and security tokens.
privacy_analytics_cookies: With your consent, we use analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our website:
privacy_marketing_cookies: With your consent, we use marketing cookies for advertising and retargeting:
privacy_manage_cookies: You can change your cookie settings at any time via the cookie settings in the footer of our website.
privacy_third_party_intro: We use the following third-party services that may process your data:
privacy_gdpr_intro: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
Request a copy of your personal data: Request a copy of your personal data
Limit how we use your data: Limit how we use your data
Receive your data in a structured format: Receive your data in a structured format
Object to processing of your data: Object to processing of your data
privacy_retention: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:
privacy_security: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits.
privacy_changes: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on our website. The 'Last Updated' date at the bottom of this page indicates when this policy was last revised.
privacy_contact_intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
